response.overview: A compilation of outstanding live performances by today's premier artists presented in pristine High Definition.  Foreigner: Feels Like The First Time  Stevie Nicks: Gold Dust Woman  Steve Winwood: Dear Mr. Fantasy  Sheryl Crow: Everyday Is A Winding Road  Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers: Refugee  Heart: Magic Man  George Jones: He Stopped Loving Her Today  Trace Adkins: Chrome  REO Speedwagon: Take It On The Run  Chris Isaak: Wicked Game  Idina Menzel: Defying Gravity  Idina Menzel and Josh Grobin: Awake  Jewel: Foolish Games  Jewel: Hands  Ringo Starr: Photograph  Fleetwood Mac: The Chain
response.title: The Best Of Soundstage
